ABOUTUS.title: about us
ABOUTUS.sub_title_dec: Our concept of property management is different. We do comprehensive service, which is the modern concept of property management that saves the owner and buyer All kinds of suffering And that without any additional cost, as the technology saved a lot, expenses and fees Rukn Al Rowad Real Estate Company provides its valued clients with property management service in several aspects.
ABOUTUS.title_part1_ln2: - Prepare monthly financial reports for all works that have been carried out and their cost.
ABOUTUS.title_part2_ln1: - Preparing, drafting, concluding contracts and legally reviewing them.
ABOUTUS.title_part2_ln2: - Coordination of the relationship with the tenants.
ABOUTUS.title_part2_ln3: - Raising and following up rental lawsuits.
ABOUTUS.title_part2_ln4: - Implementing settlements with defaulted clients and taking all legal guarantees.
ABOUTUS.title_part3: Third: Follow up the technical works
ABOUTUS.title_part3_ln1: - Carrying out all maintenance work with the lowest material costs.
ABOUTUS.title_part3_ln2: - Implementing the necessary periodic preventive maintenance in order to avoid future malfunctions.
ABOUTUS.title_part3_ln4: - Cleaning and security services for managed properties.
ABOUTUS.title_part3_ln5: - Preparing a report on the state of the property.
ABOUTUS.title_part3_ln6: - Preparing and equipping empty units for the purpose of renting.
ABOUTUS.title_part4_ln1: - Providing the best prices for maintenance and cleaning works.
ABOUTUS.title_part4_ln3: - Securing materials and equipment at the right price and high quality.
ABOUTUS.title_part4_ln4: - Implementing the necessary preventive maintenance, whether electricity, paints, floors, or carpentry.
ABOUTUS.title_part4_ln5: - Fast, timely implementation of maintenance work.
ABOUTUS.title_part4_ln7: - A team with experience in required maintenance, repairs and extensions.
ABOUTUS.title_part5: Fifth: Classified by the Real Estate Authority in
